actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, and the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to prohibit the noncompetitive awarding of insurance contracts on certain Government-supported exports.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, and the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to prohibit the noncompetitive awarding of insurance contracts on certain Government-supported exports.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, and the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to prohibit the noncompetitive awarding of insurance contracts on certain Government-supported exports.
